body:
<PAGER id="${1}" pager="${2|false,true|}">
    <PAGE>
        <BOX>

        </BOX>
    </PAGE>
    <PAGE>
        <BOX>

        </BOX>
    </PAGE>
</PAGER>
<BOX halign="center" layout="row" expand="false" width="100%">
    <TOOLTIP label="First Page"><BUTTON label="«" onclick="page('first')" /></TOOLTIP>
    <TOOLTIP label="Previous Page"><BUTTON label="‹" onclick="page('previous')" /></TOOLTIP>
    <BOX expand="false">
        <TEXT width="100">
            Page: {${1}.currentpage}
        </TEXT> 
        <BOX layout="row" expand="false">
            <TEXT value="Go to: " />
            <PADDING left="5" />
            <LINK onclick="page(1)"><TEXT value="_1_" /></LINK>
            <PADDING left="5" />
            <LINK onclick="page(2)"><TEXT value="_2_" /></LINK>
        </BOX>
    </BOX>
    <TOOLTIP label="Next Page"><BUTTON label="›" onclick="page('next')" /></TOOLTIP>
    <TOOLTIP label="Last Page"><BUTTON label="»" onclick="page('last')" /></TOOLTIP>
</BOX>
PAGER (w/ custom navigation) [FML].description: A Pager snippet with custom navigation
